doc.title: On/Off
doc.plot: When James's girlfriend invites her boss to have dinner at home, she asks James to behave and treat them as if they were the most important people in the world. When she goes to the local shop to buy dessert, the invitees arrive and James tries to behave as a perfect host. However, some household equipment starts to work weirdly and James tries to cover all that weirdness with unexpected consequences.
